uk.me.m0rjc.picstategenerator.model

Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.me.m0rjc.picstategenerator.model.Command
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeCommand, GosubCommand, ReturnFromSubroutineCommand

    public abstract class Command
extends Object
    A command we can ask to be built. Commands are immutable, so instances can be reused.
    Author:
    Richard Corfield <m0rjc@m0rjc.me.uk>

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        public abstract void accept(StateModel model,
          IModelVisitor visitor)
        Render this command using the visitor.
        Parameters:
        model - model being rendered
        visitor - that which shall render it.

      • clearValue

        public static Command clearValue(Variable value)
        Convenience method to create a Clear Value command.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to clear
        Returns:
        the created Command instance.

      • clearIndexedValue

        public static Command clearIndexedValue(Variable value,
                        Variable indexer)
        Convenience method to create a Clear Indexed Value command.
        Parameters:
        value - the array variable to clear a member of.
        indexer - the variable holding the index.
        Returns:
        the Command instance.

      • storeValue

        public static Command storeValue(Variable input,
                 Variable output)
        Convenience method to create a "Store Value" command.
        Parameters:
        input - variable to read from
        output - vatiable to write to
        Returns:
        the Command instance.

      • incrementValue

        public static Command incrementValue(Variable value)
        Convenience method to create an "Increment Value" command.
        Parameters:
        value - variable to increment
        Returns:
        the new Command instance.

      • storeValueIndex

        public static Command storeValueIndex(Variable input,
                      Variable output,
                      Variable outputIndexer)
        Convenience method to create a "Store Value at indexed location" command.
        Parameters:
        input - variable to read from.
        output - array variable to write to.
        outputIndexer - variable containing the index.
        Returns:
        the Command isntance.

      • setFlag

        public static Command setFlag(Variable flags,
              String flagName,
              boolean newValue)
        Convenience method to create a "Set Flag" command.
        Parameters:
        flags - variable holding the flags
        flagName - name of the flag within the variable
        newValue - expected value
        Returns:
        the created Command instance.

      • call

        public static Command call(RomLocation method)
        Create a command to call a method. The method name must have been registered with the model as an external symbol.
        Parameters:
        method - method to call
        Returns:
        the created Command instance.

      • subroutine

        public static Command subroutine(String stateName)
        Create a command to make the state machine enter a subroutine. The instruction after this command will be stored as the return address. A command to go to the named node will be rendered.
        Parameters:
        stateName - Node to call as a subroutine.
        Returns:
        the Command instance giving that command.

      • requiresSubroutineStack

        public boolean requiresSubroutineStack()
        Returns:
        Does this command require the subroutine stack? The default implementation returns false.

      • getTargetNode

        public String getTargetNode()
        If this command calls a node then return it here. Otherwise return null. An example would be the Gosub command.
        Returns:
        the target node name, or null for none.
